Title: The Equalizer 2
Writer: Richard Wenk, Michael Sloan (based on the television series created by), Richard Lindheim (based on the television series created by)
Actors: Denzel Washington, Pedro Pascal, Ashton Sanders, Orson Bean
Plot: Robert McCall serves an unflinching justice for the exploited and oppressed, but how far will he go when that is someone he loves?
Language: English, French, Turkish, Hebrew, Arabic, Spanish
